snippet: McDowell shot a one-under-par 71 as his lead in the HSBC Champions in Shanghai dwindled to a shot over Hiroshi Iwata, a gate-crasher on a leader board top-heavy with major champions.
abstract: Graeme McDowell's lead in the HSBC Champions in Shanghai dwindles to a shot over Hiroshi Iwata, a gate-crasher on a leader board top-heavy with major champions; other golf scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: McDowell shot a one-under-par 71 as his lead in the HSBC Champions in Shanghai dwindled to a shot over Hiroshi Iwata, a gate-crasher on a leader board top-heavy with major champions.

headline.main: Graeme McDowell Holds Narrow Lead in Shanghai
headline.print_headline: McDowell Holds Narrow Lead in Shanghai
